name: SpookyToken
description: SpookySwap Finance is an automated market-making (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Fantom Opera network. SpookySwap is focused on building a strong foundation with the BOO token as a governance token, diverse farms, a built in bridge, built in limit orders and user-centered service.

en.description: SpookySwap Finance is an automated market-making (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Fantom Opera network. SpookySwap is focused on building a strong foundation with the BOO token as a governance token, diverse farms, a built in bridge, built in limit orders and user-centered service.

tr.description: SpookySwap Finance, Fantom Opera ağı için otomatikleştirilmiş bir piyasa yapıcı (AMM) merkezi olmayan borsadır (DEX). SpookySwap, bir yönetişim belirteci, çeşitli çiftlikler, yerleşik bir köprü, yerleşik limit emirleri ve kullanıcı merkezli hizmet olarak BOO belirteci ile güçlü bir temel oluşturmaya odaklanmıştır.

vi.description: SpookySwap Finance is an automated market-making (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Fantom Opera network. SpookySwap is focused on building a strong foundation with the BOO token as a governance token, diverse farms, a built in bridge, built in limit orders and user-centered service.

zh.description: SpookySwap Finance 是 Fantom Opera 网络上的自动做市商（AMM）去中心化交易所（DEX）。它以 BOO 为治理代币建立了强大的基础设施，包括多样化的农场、内置桥、内置限价单等以用户为中心的服务。

hi.description: SpookySwap Finance, Fantom Opera नेटवर्क के लिए एक स्वचालित बाजार-निर्माण (AMM) विकेन्द्रीकृत एक्सचेंज (DEX) है। SpookySwap गवर्नेंस टोकन, विविध फार्म, बिल्ट इन ब्रिज, बिल्ट इन लिमिट ऑर्डर और उपयोगकर्ता-केंद्रित सेवा के रूप में BOO टोकन के साथ एक मजबूत नींव बनाने पर केंद्रित है।
